page.title: 10ORGANIC MARKET GARDENING
page.content: A small percentage of this land is farmed{organically.}There is one tenant farmer who fertilizes his land {organically}and uses no artificial sprays or fertilizers. There is also a smallholding owned and worked by a husband and wife.They produce vegetables,herbs and pigs.The pigs are fed only on natural foods. Some of the produce from this smallholding is sold direct to the passing public but the bulk is sold to a wholesale distribution centre nearby.The public purchasing from the wholesaler are not aware it is {organically}grown produce.
